p: A correspondence analysis (CA) based on abundance of the different orders in the 12 cod individuals revealed a tightly clustered group of medium and high exposure samples (49, 50, 57 and 58) (Fig. 6). In concurrence with the findings from MetaStats analysis, fitting of environmental parameters (bacterial orders) demonstrated that these samples were significantly (p = 0.002) and positively correlated with Deferribacterales [see Additional file 15].
